## lineClampedText variable

Display ellipsis for overflow text

**Signature:**

```typescript
lineClampedText: ({ fontSize, lineCount, lineHeight, }: {
    fontSize: string;
    lineCount: number;
    lineHeight: number;
}) => import("@emotion/utils").SerializedStyles
```
